verses.name: Psalms 34:13
verses.text: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.

verses.name: Psalms 34:14
verses.text: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.

verses.name: Psalms 34:15
verses.text: The eyes of the Lord are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.

verses.name: Psalms 34:16
verses.text: The face of the Lord is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 34:17
verses.text: The righteous cry, and the Lord heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.

verses.name: Psalms 34:18
verses.text: The Lord is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
